00001 #include "StdAfx.h"
00002 #include "GraphRenderer.h"
00003 
00004 GraphRenderer::GraphRenderer(int argc, char** argv, double scene_size, boost::shared_ptr< SceneGraph > graph) :
00005 graph_(graph), graphRendererVisitor(graph), GlutApplication(argc, argv, "Graph Renderer")
00006 {
00007         glutApplicationPointer = this;
00008         phi=0.0;
00009         theta=0.0;
00010         sdepth = scene_size / 2.0;
00011         zNear=1.0;
00012         zFar=scene_size;
00013         downY = 0;
00014         downX = 0;
00015         aspect = (double) windowWidth_ / (double) windowHeight_;
00016         leftButton = false;
00017         middleButton = false;
00018 }

00020 GraphRenderer::~GraphRenderer(void)
00021 {
00022 }

00024 void GraphRenderer::OnInit(void)
00025 {
00026         glClearDepth (1.0);
00027         glEnable (GL_DEPTH_TEST) ;
00028         glDepthFunc (GL_LEQUAL) ;
00029         glEnable(GL_CULL_FACE); // Enable Culling
00030         glCullFace(GL_BACK);
00031         glDisable( GL_BLEND );
00032         glTexEnvi(GL_TEXTURE_ENV, GL_TEXTURE_ENV_MODE, GL_REPLACE);
00033 
00034         
00035 
00036 
00037 }
00038 
00039 void GraphRenderer::OnReshapeWindow(int newWidth, int newHeight)
00040 {
00041         windowHeight_ = newHeight;
00042         windowWidth_ = newWidth;
00043         aspect = (double)windowWidth_ / (double)windowHeight_;
00044         glViewport( 0, 0, windowWidth_, windowHeight_ );
00045         glMatrixMode(GL_PROJECTION);
00046         glLoadIdentity();
00047         gluPerspective(64.0, aspect, zNear, zFar);
00048         
00049         glutPostRedisplay();
00050 }
00051 
00052 void GraphRenderer::OnDisplay(void)
00053 {
00054         glClear(GL_COLOR_BUFFER_BIT | GL_DEPTH_BUFFER_BIT);
00055         glMatrixMode(GL_MODELVIEW);
00056         glLoadIdentity();
00057         glTranslated(0.0,0.0,-sdepth);
00058         glRotated(-theta, 1.0, 0.0, 0.0);
00059         glRotated(phi, 0.0, 0.0, 1.0);
00060         boost::depth_first_search( graph_->getGraph(), visitor( graphRendererVisitor ) );
00061         glutSwapBuffers();
00062 }

00064 void GraphRenderer::OnKeyPressed(unsigned char keyPressed, int x, int y)
00065 {
00066 
00067 }
00068 
00069 void GraphRenderer::OnMousePressed(int button, int state, int x, int y)
00070 {
00071         
00072         downX = x; downY = y;
00073 
00074         leftButton = ((button == GLUT_LEFT_BUTTON) && (state == GLUT_DOWN));
00075 
00076         middleButton = ((button == GLUT_MIDDLE_BUTTON) &&  (state == GLUT_DOWN));
00077 
00078         glutPostRedisplay();
00079 }
00080 
00081 void GraphRenderer::OnMouseDrag(int x, int y)
00082 {
00083         
00084         if (leftButton)
00085         {
00086                 phi += (double)(x-downX)/4.0;
00087                 theta += (double)(downY-y)/4.0;
00088         } // rotate
00089 
00090         if (middleButton)
00091         {
00092                 sdepth += (double)(downY - y) / 10.0;
00093         } // scale
00094 
00095         downX = x;   downY = y; 
00096 
00097         glutPostRedisplay();
00098 }
